org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.qourum

Class QuorumManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.qourum.QuorumManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.activemq.api.core.client.ClusterTopologyListener, org.apache.activemq.core.server.ActiveMQComponent

    public final class QuorumManager
extends Object
implements org.apache.activemq.api.core.client.ClusterTopologyListener, org.apache.activemq.core.server.ActiveMQComponent
    A QourumManager can be used to register a Quorum to receive notifications about changes to the cluster. A Quorum can then issue a vote to the remaining nodes in a cluster for a specific outcome

      • nodeUP

        public void nodeUP(org.apache.activemq.api.core.client.TopologyMember topologyMember,
                   boolean last)
        called by the ServerLocatorInternal when the topology changes. we update the maxClusterSize if needed and inform the Quorum's.
        Specified by:
        nodeUP in interface org.apache.activemq.api.core.client.ClusterTopologyListener
        Parameters:
        topologyMember - the topolgy changed
        last - if the whole cluster topology is being transmitted (after adding the listener to the cluster connection) this parameter will be true for the last topology

      • nodeDown

                     String nodeID)
        notify the Quorum of a topology change.
        Specified by:

      • voteComplete

        public void voteComplete(QuorumVoteServerConnect quorumVote)
        must be called by the quorum when it is happy on an outcome. only one vote can take place at anyone time for a specific quorum
        Parameters:
        quorumVote - the vote
